channel.title: Comments on: Re. OpenCon statement â€“ update 3.

item.title: By: Open conned
item.dc:creator: Open conned
item.description:
Good luck. I'm horrified by this organisation, and feel badly for you.
Pretty glad now that all my applications to attend this conference were rejected. There was no transparency in that process either. 'Open-conned', what a joke.
Don't let the buggers get you down.
item.content:encoded:
Good luck. I’m horrified by this organisation, and feel badly for you.

Pretty glad now that all my applications to attend this conference were rejected. There was no transparency in that process either. ‘Open-conned’, what a joke.

Don’t let the buggers get you down.
